name: VS Code
description: Microsoft's ubiquitous code editor with MCP extensions
manual_instructions:
### Manual Configuration for VS Code

To manually connect VS Code to MCP Scooter:

1. Install an MCP-compatible extension (e.g., [MCP Client](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=mcp.client)).
2. Open the extension settings or configuration file.
3. Add a new server with the following URL:

```
http://localhost:6277/profiles/{profile}/sse
```
